text: The Quarterback is a 1926 American comedy movie directed by Fred C. Newmeyer and starring Richard Dix, David Butler, Esther Ralston, Harry Beresford. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1926 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Fred C. Newmeyer
title: The Quarterback (1926 movie)
